parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> High Command

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Event Handlers

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Defines an action performed when pointer, previously positioned over icon, is moved away from it (3D or in a map). The code is executed once.<br><br> 
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Informative</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Since '''Arma 3''' ''v1.57'' a stackable version of this EH is available: [[Arma_3:_Event_Handlers/addMissionEventHandler#GroupIconOverLeave|GroupIconOverLeave]]</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''onGroupIconOverLeave''' command

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> command:  [[String]] or [[Code]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[onGroupIconOverLeave]]
{
    // Passed values for _this are:
    _is3D = _this [[select]] 0;
    _group = _this [[select]] 1;
    _wpID = _this [[select]] 2;
    _posx = _this [[select]] 3;
    _posy = _this [[select]] 4;
    _shift = _this [[select]] 5;
    _ctrl = _this [[select]] 6;
    _alt = _this [[select]] 7;

    _message = [[format]] ["____ Info ____"];
    {_message = _message + [[format]] ["\n %1",_x]} [[forEach]] _this;
    [[hint]] _message;
}</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[onGroupIconClick]], [[onGroupIconOverEnter]], [[groupIconSelectable]], [[setGroupIconsSelectable]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]</root>
